rows.label: qst002601_msg001
rows.name:
No no no...
Where could it be?

rows.label: qst002601_msg003
rows.name:
Have you seen a rock shaped like
a turtle anywhere? It's only little...

rows.label: qst002601_msg004
rows.name:
I dropped it someplace when I was
playing outside the city yesterday.

rows.label: qst002601_msg005
rows.name:
I looked and looked and looked
but I couldn't find it anywhere...

rows.label: qst002601_msg006
rows.name:
The stupid snow probably
buried it by now.

rows.label: qst002601_msg007
rows.name:
If I don't find it soon, even more
snow will fall and it'll be lost forever.

rows.label: qst002601_msg008
rows.name:
Um, so, like, um, my dad gave
me that stone. Said it'd help
me grow up big and strong.

rows.label: qst002601_msg009
rows.name:
That was before he left.
Mum said he went a really
super long way away.

rows.label: qst002601_msg010
rows.name:
But I'm not lonely... Least,
I wasn't when I had my turtle
stone to remind me of him.

rows.label: qst002601_msg011
rows.name:
I wonder if Mr. Turtle is
all right. I hope he's not lonely.
I gotta find him soon...

rows.label: qst002601_msg012
rows.name:
You'll help?
Thank you thank you thank you!

rows.label: qst002601_msg013
rows.name:
I'm going to keep looking around
here a bit longer, so you go check
around near Amphoret Pillar, OK?

rows.label: qst002601_msg014
rows.name:
I was over there yesterday so
I might have dropped it then.

rows.label: qst002601_msg102
rows.name: You go look around Amphoret Pillar.

rows.label: qst002601_msg103
rows.name:
I was over there yesterday so
I might have dropped it then.
